about_the_game:
Teleball is the world's first first-person Virtual Reality platformer! Throw Teleballs to navigate over 30 environments dodging over 60 traps, obstacles, and more!

Features:

  • Designed from the ground up for accessibility and VR friendliness!
  • 30+ levels each adding new mechanics across 6 different zones!
  • Use 8 different Teleballs to navigate environments and avoid over 60 obstacles and traps!
  • Try to beat the developer's time trials and par scores to earn secret levels and mechanics!
  • Customize your experience to suit your needs with sliders for strength and ease-of-use features tailor-made for VR!
  • Accessibility features like colorblind mode, left-handed mode, and fear-of-heights mode!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Home 32-bit
  • Processor: If it's in a VR-ready machine, it'll probably work.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If it's in a VR-ready machine, it'll probably work.
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus PC, or OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: If it can run anything in VR, it can probably run this. These are the lowest specs I could try the game out on that worked well.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz (8 CPUs), ~3.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Do people even use sound cards anymore?
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus PC, or OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: This is the specs of the machine I developed on. You can almost certainly go lower than this. Internet only required for Steam Cloud Saves and Achievements.

short_description: Teleball is a VR game that lets you do everyone's favorite thing in VR, throw stuff! Use 8 powerful Teleballs to teleport around environments with more than 60 obstacles, traps, and more! Teleball is designed with accessibility in mind, everyone's invited to come check out our balls!
